className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

enableShopSimilarLooks.description: Flag to show Shop Similar Looks Link

mediaGallery.description: This the slot for the media gallery

storeSelector.description: Store Selector to use with the Find In Store component

textBlocks.description: Additional text blocks that can be added in the view

socialShare.description: This the slot for the social share

findInStoreLinkText.comment: Button text for the find in store section

findInStoreHeaderText.value: Buy now, pick up in a store
findInStoreHeaderText.comment: Heading text for the find in store section

findInStoreDescriptionText.value: Search for product availability at stores near you.
findInStoreDescriptionText.comment: Description text for the find in store section

priceFree.comment: Text to show when product is free

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text

addToCartText.comment: Text to show on add to cart button

outOfStockText.comment: Text to show when out of stock

averageRatingAriaLabel.comment: The aria label used for the average rating value

selectDimensionFormatString.comment: Text to show indicating user should select a dimension (i.e. 'Choose a color')

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Configuration Product Dimension Type (2)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

createOrderTemplateHeader.comment: Text for create order template dialog header

orderTemplateTitle.comment: Text for create order template dialog title

orderTemplateNameAriaLabel.comment: Text for create order template dialog template name input aria label

createOrderTemplateDescription.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process. Create an order template and add this item to it.
createOrderTemplateDescription.comment: Text for create order template dialog description

createNewOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog create new button

createOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog create button

cancelNewOrderTemplateCreationButtonText.comment: Text for create order template dialog cancel button

defaultOrderTemplateName.comment: Text for create order template dialog default order template name

addToOrderTemplateHeader.comment: Text for add to order template dialog header

noOrderTemplatesMessage.value: You have not created any order templates.
noOrderTemplatesMessage.comment: Text for add to order template dialog message

noOrderTemplatesDescription.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process. Create an order template and add this item to it.
noOrderTemplatesDescription.comment: Text for add to order template dialog description

createAnOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for creating an order template button

cancelOrderTemplateCreationButtonText.comment: Text for canceling adding to order template dialog

selectTemplatesText.value: Select a template or create a new one. You have {0} template(s).
selectTemplatesText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog description

addToTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog button

lineItemsText.comment: Text for add to order template dialog order template description

addToOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for add to order template button

addToOrderTemplateMessage.comment: Text for showing for adding item to your order template message

addItemToOrderTemplateError.value: Unable to add item to order template
addItemToOrderTemplateError.comment: For showing error message on adding item to order template

viewOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

continueShoppingButtonText.comment: Continue shopping on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemOneTex.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderItemFormat.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToOrderTemplateHeaderMessageTex.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

duplicatedProductsHeader.comment: Error dialog header when order template already has the same item added

duplicatedProductsDescription.value: This product has been added to the selected order template in the past. Do you want to update the product quantity in the order template?
duplicatedProductsDescription.comment: Error dialog description when order template already has the same item added

updateQuantityButtonText.comment: Error dialog cancel button text when order template already has the same item added

cancelDuplicateItemsButtonText.comment: Error dialog override quantity button text when order template already has the same item added

addToWishlistButtonText.comment: Text for add to wishlist button

removeFromWishlistButtonText.comment: Text for remove from wishlist button

nameOfWishlist.comment: Name given to wishlist while creating it

inputQuantityAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the input quantity

addToWishlistMessage.comment: Text for showing for adding item to your wishlist message

removedFromWishlistMessage.comment: Text for showing removing item from your wishlist

addItemToWishlistError.value: Unable to add item to wishlist
addItemToWishlistError.comment: For showing error message on adding item from wishlist

removeItemFromWishlistError.value: Unable to remove item from wishlist
removeItemFromWishlistError.comment: For showing error message on removing from wishlist

errorMessageOutOfStock.value: This product is out of stock
errorMessageOutOfStock.comment: Error message to show when product is out of stock

errorMessageOutOfRangeOneLeft.value: There is only one product left. Please choose quantity within the available range
errorMessageOutOfRangeOneLeft.comment: Error message to show when quantity selected is more than the quantity left, and only one product is left

errorMessageOutOfRangeFormat.value: There are only {numLeft} products left. Please choose quantity within the available range
errorMessageOutOfRangeFormat.comment: Error message to show when quantity selected is more than the quantity left. {numLeft} is the number of products left.

productDimensionTypeColorErrorMessage.value: Color is required. Please choose a color
productDimensionTypeColorErrorMessage.comment: Error string to show when the user has not selected a color

productDimensionTypeConfigurationErrorMe.value: Configuration is required. Please choose a configuration
productDimensionTypeConfigurationErrorMe.comment: Error string to show when the user has not selected a configuration

productDimensionTypeSizeErrorMessage.value: Size is required. Please choose a size
productDimensionTypeSizeErrorMessage.comment: Error string to show when the user has not selected a size

productDimensionTypeStyleErrorMessage.value: Style is required. Please choose a style
productDimensionTypeStyleErrorMessage.comment: Error string to show when the user has not selected a style

buyboxErrorMessageHeader.comment: Header text for the error message region

addedToCartFailureMessage.value: Add to cart failed. Please refresh and retry
addedToCartFailureMessage.comment: Message to show when add to cart fails

maxQuantityLimitText.value: You already have {curQuantity} of this item in your shopping bag. You can only add {maxQuantity} of this item to your shopping bag
maxQuantityLimitText.comment: String to show message that you've reached max quantity {maxQuantity} is the max quantity

shopSimilarLooksText.comment: Text to show on Shop similar looks button

buyBoxGoToCartText.comment: Text to show on Button to view cart

buyBoxContinueShoppingText.comment: Text to show on Button to continue shopping

buyBoxSingleItemText.comment: Text to show if one item is added

buyBoxMultiLineItemFormatText.comment: Text to show if multiple items added

buyBoxHeaderMessageText.comment: Text to show if a item is added to the bag
